mapper.update: update visitor set LeftTime=#{LeftTime} where id=#{id}
update visitor set LeftTime=now() where LeftTime is null
mapper.select: select v.id id, v.visitTime visitTime, v.leftTime leftTime, v.ip ip, v.comfrom comfrom, v.agent agent, u.id uid, u.name name, m.id mid, m.name realName from visitor v ,member m,user u where u.id = v.uid and u.id=m.uid
select * from visitor v where meid=#{meid} and identityType=#{identityType} and VisitTime=#{VisitTime}

select v.id id, v.meid meid, v.identityType videntityType, v.visitTime visitTime, v.leftTime leftTime, v.ip ip, v.agent agent, vme.id vmeId, vme.identityType vmeidentityType, vme.name vmeName from visitor v ,`v_mem&exp` vme where v.meid = vme.id and v.identityType=vme.identityType order by visitTime DESC
